instructions:
Add olive oil to a hot, large skillet along with chopped onions. Sauté over medium heat 5 minutes. Then
add chopped peppers and garlic and sauté an additional 10 minutes. Cover and steam for an additional 5
minutes. Mix tomato sauce, Worcestershire sauce and salt, and stir into onions and peppers. Transfer to 1
1/2 quart baking casserole, sprinkle with Swiss then Parmesan cheese. Bake uncovered in a 375 F oven for
45 minutes.
*(May be transferred to 4 small loaf pans, baked uncovered at 350 F for 40 minutes, wrapped in foil and
frozen. To serve, thaw in refrigerator and heat at 375 F for 15 minutes wrapped in foil then an additional 15
minutes uncovered.)* 
*(Rev. 4/18/93)*
ingredients: 2 3" or 4" Vadalia, Walla Walla or Spanish onions,
name: Peppers And Onion Casserole
creator: Jim Decker
